name.baseName: Aluminum Recycling ; Recycled Aluminum Ingots ; Scrap Aluminum ; 2009
铝再生 ; 再生铝锭 ; 废铝 ; 2009年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The recycled aluminum ingots obtained from the process are employed in various sectors including automotive, construction, electronics, and packaging industries. These ingots are manufactured from scrap aluminum through a recycling operation and serve as a raw material for producing aluminum products which require lower energy consumption compared with primary aluminum production.
从该过程中获得的再生铝锭用于汽车、建筑、电子和包装工业等多个领域。这些铝锭是通过回收操作从废铝中制成的，作为生产铝产品的原料，与原铝生产相比，其能耗较低。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The recycled aluminum ingots obtained from the process are employed in various sectors including automotive, construction, electronics, and packaging industries. These ingots are manufactured from scrap aluminum through a recycling operation and serve as a raw material for producing aluminum products which require lower energy consumption compared with primary aluminum production.
从该过程中获得的再生铝锭用于汽车、建筑、电子和包装工业等多个领域。这些铝锭是通过回收操作从废铝中制成的，作为生产铝产品的原料，与原铝生产相比，其能耗较低。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this LCA dataset, please ensure that all modeling aligns with the technological scope provided by the dataset, taking into consideration the usage of technology in the year 2009. Since the PA and SA data are drawn from statistical sources and literature, respectively, it is advisable to verify the relevance and update the data if necessary to reflect current practices. Background data from the CAS RCEES 2018 database should be used with an understanding of the regional context, as it is specific to China. The methodological guidance provided must be rigorously followed, especially in terms of system boundaries, allocation procedures, and the treatment of recycling in the life cycle analysis.
在使用此LCA数据集时，请确保所有建模均符合数据集提供的技术范围，并考虑2009年的技术使用情况。由于PA和SA数据分别来自统计来源和文献，建议核实数据的相关性，并在必要时更新数据以反映当前实践。应理解CAS RCEES 2018数据库的区域背景并特定于中国，所以使用背景数据时需特别注意。必须严格遵循提供的方法论指导，特别是在系统边界、分摊程序以及生命周期分析中回收处理的建议。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
